# Restoration, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, M (diamond dust worth 5,000 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 334

This spell functions like *[[Restoration, Lesser (Spell)|lesser restoration]],* except that it dispels all permanent and temporary negative levels afflicting the healed creature. *Greater restoration* also dispels all magical effects penalizing the creatureâ€™s abilities, cures all temporary ability damage, and restores all points permanently drained from all ability scores. It also eliminates fatigue and exhaustion, and removes all forms of insanity, [[Confusion (Spell)|confusion]], and similar mental effects.
